problem.markdown: Which page elements are best to avoid changing or proceed with caution in your CSS? (!) fonts ( ) margins ( ) colours ( ) dividers (@x) all of the above, especially if changing for all elements across the entire page [explanation] The design of a website relies on a matching aesthetic on that page's elements. While these particular elements may feel like small change, each one of them was chosen for a reason. Changing one of them may require you to change all of them before you get something that looks good. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Which page elements are best to avoid changing or proceed with caution in your CSS?

choicegroup.choice: all of the above, especially if changing for all elements across the entire page
